mobilecompany

Class ConsoleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobilecompany.ConsoleHelper

  • public class ConsoleHelper
extends Object
    A class that contains auxiliary methods for working with console of a mobile company instance.
    Author:
    orange

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConsoleHelper getInstance()
        Gets the single instance of ConsoleHelper.
        Returns:
        single instance of ConsoleHelper

      • initFilterCommands

        public void initFilterCommands()
        Initialise the list of console commands which can be used to filter the tariffs list. Basically, get a list of all fields in Tariffs class and its subclasses.

      • checkCommand

        public boolean checkCommand(String str)
        Check if a given string is a valid filter command.
        Parameters:
        str - a string to be a filter command with min max values
        Returns:
        true if str is a valid filter command

      • extractCommand

        public String extractCommand(String str)
        Extract the command name from the filter command string.
        E. g.: sms 10 20 --> sms.
        The command name is some field name of Tariff or its subclass.
        Parameters:
        str - a filter command string.
        Returns:
        the command name.

      • extractMin

        public double extractMin(String str)
        Extract the lower boundary from the filter command string.
        Parameters:
        str - a filter command string.
        Returns:
        the lower boundary for the corresponding field.

      • extractMax

        public double extractMax(String str)
        Extract the upper boundary from the filter command string.
        Parameters:
        str - a filter command string.
        Returns:
        the upper boundary for the field.

      • cmdToGetter

        public String cmdToGetter(String cmd)
        Convert a field name (a filter command) to its getter name.
        Parameters:
        cmd - a field name (a filter command).
        Returns:
        the getter name.

      • getterToCmd

        public String getterToCmd(String getter)
        Convert a getter name to the respective field name (the filter command).
        Parameters:
        getter - a getter name.
        Returns:
        the field name (the filter command).

      • showHelp

        public void showHelp()
        Show help on the supported console commands.

      • getPredicate

        public Predicate<Tariff> getPredicate(String cmd,
                                      double min,
                                      double max)
        Construct a predicate to filter out tariffs. A field name should have values in min..max inclusively.
        Parameters:
        cmd - a field name (a filter command).
        min - the lower boundary for the field.
        max - the upper boundary for the field.
        Returns:
        a predicate for filtering.
